title: MapPolyLine Segments and stroke
body: Would like to see an improvement in MapPolyLine that allows multiple Individual Segments that have there own properties i.e. for example, once you add a location to MapPolyLine Instance, that becomes a segment, I should then be able to control the look and feed such as Color of the stroke for that segment of the MapPolyLine. Currently Changing the stroke changes the color for the entire line regardless of how many locations are added to the line. Also would like the ability to make the Line a 3d gradient shape to have it pop out more on the map control.
